name: Sync Result
description: Consolidates all user-defined inputs for the resulting trajectory and coordinate them into a single, unified trajectory.

inputParameters.name: element_id
inputParameters.description: The number of the BuildingPlan Step that the trajectory is intended for.

inputParameters.name: trajectory
inputParameters.description: trajectory that is intended to be published.

inputParameters.name: robot_base_fame
inputParameters.description: The location of the robot in relation to the design object.

inputParameters.name: pick_and_place
inputParameters.description: Notifies the application if the trajectory is intended to attach a building element in the process.

inputParameters.name: pick_index
inputParameters.description: The index in the trajectory in which the element should be attached to the robot.

inputParameters.name: ee_link_name
inputParameters.description: The link name in which the element should be attached to.

inputParameters.name: options
inputParameters.description: Information passed from the COMPAS XR Options Component.
